page.title: 12Birdingbury Hall
page.content: Birdingbury Hall is situated at the edge of Birdingbury village,over looking the River Leam.This 350 year old hall is owned by Pirbic Midlands Limited,who use it as a Management Training Centre.People come from all over the Midlands to use the hall and Pirbic employ forty people.As the village of Birdingbury is so isolated the only means of transport is by car, although one employee comes on her motor-bike.The Hall is set back in its own private grounds,which are beautifully laid out and kept by a handful of dedicated gardeners.The grounds are open once a year to the villagers who hold their annual Garden Fete on the last Saturday in June.
